field.label: Enable Category Robots
field.comment:
Enable robots meta tag management for categories and their products
How to Use
Category Robots Settings:
1. Go to Catalog > Categories
2. Edit any category and expand Search Engine Optimization section
3. Configure the following fields:
  • Robots Meta Tag - Controls indexing for the category page itself
  • Apply Robots to Category Products - Enable to apply robots settings to products in this category
  • Robots for Category Products - Choose robots settings for products (shown when toggle is enabled)

Available Options:
  • Use Config - Use default system settings
  • Use Category Robots - Inherit from category's robots setting (products only)
  • INDEX, FOLLOW - Allow search engines to index and follow links
  • NOINDEX, FOLLOW - Don't index but follow links
  • INDEX, NOFOLLOW - Index but don't follow links
  • NOINDEX, NOFOLLOW - Don't index and don't follow links
  • NOARCHIVE variants - Same as above but prevent caching

Example: Warehouse Deals Category
To prevent indexing of Warehouse Deals category and its products:
1. Set Robots Meta Tag to "NOINDEX, NOFOLLOW"
2. Enable Apply Robots to Category Products
3. Set Robots for Category Products to "Use Category Robots" or "NOINDEX, NOFOLLOW"
